data.eml:eml: The identity of Albuca caudata Jacq. (Hyacinthaceae) and a description of a new related species: A. bakeri

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Martinez-Azorin, Mario, Crespo, Manuel B., Dold, Anthony P., Barker, Nigel P. (2011): The identity of Albuca caudata Jacq. (Hyacinthaceae) and a description of a new related species: A. bakeri. PhytoKeys 5: 5-19, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.5.1166, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.5.1166
